storyPage.title: Creative Story Generation
storyPage.description: Generate creative stories using our Heterogeneous Recursive Planning framework. Provide a prompt describing the story you want to create, and our system will recursively plan and generate a cohesive narrative.

form.promptPlaceholder: Describe the story you want to generate...
form.modelHelperText: Enter any model name or select from suggestions
form.apiKeysNote: Your API keys are stored securely in your browser's local storage and are never sent to our servers. They are only used to make direct API calls to the respective services from your browser.

examples.title: Example Prompts
examples.description: Click on any example to use it as your prompt:

specific.title: Be Specific
specific.description: Provide specific details about the characters, setting, and plot elements you want in your story.

parameters.title: Define Parameters
parameters.description: Specify the perspective (first-person, third-person), tone (humorous, serious), and length of the story you want.

creativity.title: Allow Creativity
creativity.description: While providing guidance, leave room for the system to develop creative elements that enhance your story.

reportPage.title: Technical Report Generation
reportPage.description: Generate comprehensive technical reports using our Heterogeneous Recursive Planning framework. The system integrates information retrieval, logical reasoning, and content composition to create well-structured and informative reports.

form.promptPlaceholder: Describe the technical report you want to generate...
form.modelHelperText: Enter any model name or select from suggestions
form.apiKeysNote: Your API keys are stored securely in your browser's local storage and are never sent to our servers. They are only used to make direct API calls to the respective services from your browser.

examples.title: Example Topics
examples.description: Click on any example to use it as your prompt:

scope.title: Define Scope
scope.description: Clearly specify the scope and focus of your report to ensure the content addresses your specific needs.

structure.title: Indicate Structure
structure.description: If you have specific requirements for the structure or sections of the report, mention them in your prompt.

depth.title: Specify Depth
depth.description: Indicate whether you need a general overview or an in-depth analysis with detailed technical information and citations.

aboutPage.title: About WriteHERE
aboutPage.description: WriteHERE is an advanced AI-powered content generation platform that utilizes Heterogeneous Recursive Planning to create high-quality stories and reports.
aboutPage.heterogeneousDescription: Our system integrates multiple AI capabilities - writing, reasoning, and searching - to handle different aspects of the content creation process.
aboutPage.recursiveDescription: Complex tasks are broken down into subtasks that can be further decomposed if needed, creating a hierarchical planning structure.
aboutPage.apiDescription: WriteHERE connects to various AI models through their APIs. Your API keys are stored locally in your browser for security.
